body:
> sleep should be provided by libmingwex.a.

We have implemented sleep here https://go.googlesource.com/go/+/master/misc/cgo/test/sleep_windows_386.go#14

> @alexbrainman : The compiler complains that sleep() is an undefined function.

Can you provide steps for me to reproduce your problem? Don't worry about me having same mingw version as you for the moment. What should I do to see the error you're seeing? Thank you.

Alex
